title: 1999/373/EC: Council Decision of 31 May 1999 appointing a member of the Committee of the Regions
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 31 May 1999
appointing a member of the Committee of the Regions
(1999/373/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 263 thereof,
Having regard to Council Decision 98/110/EC of 26 January 1998(1) appointing members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions,
Whereas a seat as a member of the committee has become vacant following the resignation of Mr Christof Zernatto, of which the Council was notified on 19 April 1999;
Having regard to the proposal from the Austrian Government,
main_body: Mr Jรถrg Haider is hereby appointed a member of the Committee of the Regions in place of Mr Christof Zernatto for the remainder of his term of office, which expires on 25 January 2002.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 May 1999.
For the Council
The President
J. FISCHER
(1) OJ L 28, 4.2.1998, p. 19.
